title: vertical lines in replies
content: Whats the latest advice on how to remove the vertical lines in replies to emails?
creator: rayandrews

title: 128.1.0esr (64-bit) Only downloads 1-3 emails at a time
content: I've hit the refresh button 1000s of times to get halfway through my emails I'm still a few months from current it downloads 1-3 emails most of the time when hitting refresh all. And most of the help I found for this stuff is very out of date.
creator: migalehanson
